name: Get Traffic Stats for Hubspot leads with DataForSEO
description: Integrate DataForSEO Search Traffic Stats with HubSpot to pull website visitor volume for your leads. Get accurate search traffic data to prioritize prospects and boost sales outcomes. To get started, check our [Setup Guide for First Use](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1IrqX936jDtSnDf3NykePA8nhYhk1tZku9oBRxDeATXU/edit?usp=sharing).
